scripts.build: echo "No build step configured (moved to extras)"
scripts.check: node -e "console.log('NODE:', process.version); console.log('PWD:', process.cwd()); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT || 'not set'); console.log('MONGODB_URI:', !!process.env.MONGODB_URI);"
scripts.verify:env: node -e "const req=['MONGODB_URI','MONGODB_DB','MONGODB_COLLECTION'];const miss=req.filter(v=>!process.env[v]);if(miss.length){console.error('Missing env vars:',miss.join(','));process.exit(1);}console.log('All required env vars present.');"
